modName: Elisa Brea EVO 3 breton custom NPC follower
summary:
New extra NPC for town Riften will follow and marry, redone and now EVO3 final.
fixed skintone, new look and editable,
now as combat mage or combat assasin
compatible with CBBE, UNP and all the other body mods plus face mods
descriptionHtml:
Elisa Brea v1_21f custom NPC follower aka Elisa EVO 3
--------------------------------
IMPORTANT:
I am sorry to inform, but i have been away from Skyrim since september 2012 and i am no longer providing support for my mods.
If you read the description and follow all requirements there should not be any problems at all.

Thank you for understanding and for all endorsements.
EVO 4 is done - no release due to the problems to get permission to use coverwomen
--------------------------------
This is the final version of Elisa EVO3, there will not be any more updates or new look options, and i am no longer taking requests for optional looks.

[img]http://images58.fotki.com/v132/photos/7/1888817/10931457/photo-vi.jpg[/img]

news update 1.21:
-fixed the fading Elisa (invisibility bug) and the hair on shoulder and hands bug.

news update 1.2:
-A bit tweaked appearance to fit to her sister Claire
-Much old stuff removed from the esp as it was causing conflicts in some cases
-auto level up from lvl 1 to 200
Note: she levels like player, same with skills

This is the 1st one from my Ehm.. cheap girls collection ;) (and my top favourite one)
*************************************************************************
<<<!!!Choose only the assassin OR mage version!!!>>>
*************************************************************************
Don't forget to get her updated sister too! Claire Brea here -
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16179][img]http://images15.fotki.com/v588/photos/7/1888817/10638499/photo-vi.png[/img][/url] updated 2/may/2012
(NOT required, just recommended)

---------------------------------
PLEASE READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION
---------------------------------
-For users of older versions before updating:
MAKE SURE YOU DO A CLEAN SAVE BEFORE UPDATING HER, this is really important as there are many major changes to her, mainly to the .esp itself.

Creating a clean save:
-Remove all from her inventory that you would like to keep
-Dismiss her and go to another cell (behind a load door and so where she is not present)
-Save your game, quit and remove all old files of Elisa, if you have any facegen data created in the meshes and/or texture folder delete that too.
-load your game and save again (now you have a clean save, "clean" coz she is now no longer saved as a used plugin)
-Install new files and make sure with the game launcher that she is activated
-Load you last save, go to Riften and there she will be (if you did the update right)

this is an auto-level up combat assassin

She is a Follower and Marriage NPC

<Requires: Latest ApachiiSkyHair pack [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]HERE[/url] make sure apachii hair is in load order before any of my npcs!

Location:
You'll find her at night time in Haelgas bunkhouse in Riften
From 9am at the Riften market and afternoon at Beeandbarb
just look for a lady in tavern-wench clothes wearing a katana ;)
She is a poor sad girl and lonely, as her sister is far away in Whiterun and only visits her once a week, if you'll give her a coin she will be your friend and follow you
to the end of the world, even marry you if you are interested in her.
She is new in Skyrim so make her happy please :)


description and class:
this is not an edited vanilla NPC this is an EXTRA one and she is essential (cannot die)
Follower NPC addon, standalone, marriable, favor related (a coin for a beggar)
She is a combat assassin bow and one-handed preferred, but she can dual wield, if the dual wield doesn't work use this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13571 (dual wield for followers)
only spells she has is healing

New Mage version: (updated to v1.21)
this is not an edited vanilla NPC this is an EXTRA one and she is essencial (cannot die)
Follower NPC addon, standalone, marriable, favor related (a coin for a beggar)
She is a combat mage, spells she is using depends on her level up and how much magicka she has:
Healing, fireball, lightning bolt, lesser ward, greater ward, sparks, ice spike, frostbite, flames

The mage version is an fps eater so if too many npcs and you are using magic the game can get very slow on low end PCs.

Preferable armor: light

No need for any body/face mods, but she works with all of them
but to make her look like on the screenshots you will need:

Coverwomen look #1 from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]HERE[/url]

Eyes of beauty from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722]HERE[/url]

Ashara Princess of the Woods from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008]HERE[/url]

Dark wind armor from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15372]HRE[/url]
mixed with
Layer Bikini CBBE from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7736]HERE[/url]

Field mage outfit from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198]HERE[/url]

Dragon jewellery from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14146]HERE[/url]

Covereys on older screens from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]HERE[/url]

CBBE v3 from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]HERE[/url]
on some pictures UNP has been used
DIMONIZED UNP female body from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]HERE[/url]

KillerKeosSkimpy Armor Set from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654]HERE[/url]

Highly suggested follower behaviour mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23796]Lively Followers by PrinceShroob[/url] (make your follower behave like Serana)

All of my followers work with UFO, Extensible Follower Framework and Convenient Horses mods

!!!Note: On some screenshots editing software has been used, so please don't write me that in game she looks different than on the cover picture or some others, if a screenshot has been edited you will see a signature BravoOskar on the bottom right.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
She works with all body,hair and face mods and is editable in NPC editor!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

for advanced users:
if you like different hair,face,body any hair, face or body mod will do. IF you are not happy with her look, or just want to add her some weapons, armor, spells, skills etc.
just download and install the NPC editor and change her to your likings

please report bugs if you find some, but it should work perfectly, i tested it myself.
please upload a screenshot [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/members/addimages.php?id=14219]HERE[/url] if you have a problem, it will help me to fix it or give you an advice faster
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-installation: unpack and drop the esp and bsa files in skyrim/data folder

-uninstallation: delete the ElisaBrea.esp and .bsa

-NMM install: you know better, i don't use it
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
conflicts: none known

bugs and warnings:
-using custom hairs on NPCs or adding them to NPCs using NPC editor will cause double IDs means multiple selections in race menu of a particular hair type you used.
-She is updated so now the only hair double in race menu you will get is the hair she is using, it doesn't get better i tried for many days.
-her sandbox is complex so before contacting me that you cannot find her, open the console and write -
help elisa 0
and that should then show her name and id, if not it means the game doesn't load her at all so check your game launcher and that you have installed her properly
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/About_endorsements][b][i]Have fun and don't forget to endorse if you like it[/b][/i][/url]


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My follower mods (what's left on nexus): just click on a picture for the link

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14219][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/14219-1-1344467034.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15095][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/15095-1-1334437040.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16179][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/16179-1-1335796393.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21544][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/21544-1-1345045679.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23904][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23904-1-1347223279.jpg[/img][/url]

Sylvia's tattoo set moders resource:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23362][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23362-1-1346364730.jpg[/img][/url]

Easy NPC creation tutorial:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23972][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23972-1-1347330673.jpg[/img][/url]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Biiig Thanks to all who like my mods and for all endorsements you gave me for my mods

Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and for not fixing the broken Creation Kit

Biggest Thanks goes to all the patient moders out there who delivered all the great mods i am constantly downloading.


BravoOskar 30/4/2012
author: BravoOskar

files.name: Elisa Brea v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Now editable with NPC editor
fixed for one hair type and color coz of many misunderstandings with many esps, but she is editable so no need for more variations.
versions include level 120 combat assasins, auto level combat assasin and combat mage
new look and skintone, finally fixed so makeup on this time
dual wielding as combat assasin, not tested as combat mage
